inclusion.criterion: Women at least 18 years of age
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Having urinary incontinence or pelvic organ prolapse
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Capable and willing to follow all study related procedures
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Reported history of urethral obstruction (not secondary to prolapse), stricture,
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: bladder calculi or bladder tumor in the last 2 years.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant as confirmed by urine pregnancy test or plans to become pregnant during the study period.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Currently participating or have participated within the past 30 days in any clinical investigation involving or impacting urinary or renal function
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Cannot independently comprehend and complete the questionnaires.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: The subject is deemed unsuitable for enrollment in this study by the investigators based on their history or physical examination.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 16-year-old girl with myasthenia gravis, class IIa. She has diplopia and weakness affecting her upper extremities despite treatment.
